description: Enterprise techniques used by Quick Assist, ATT&CK software S1209 (v1.0)
name: Quick Assist (S1209)

techniques.comment: [Quick Assist](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1209) communicates over TCP 443 via HTTPS to a remote session server, under which RDP traffic is transferred.(Citation: Microsoft Quick Assist 2024)
[Quick Assist](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1209) allows for the remote administrator to take screenshots of the running system.(Citation: Microsoft Quick Assist 2024)

[Quick Assist](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1209) allows for the remote administrator to view the interactive session of the running machine, including full screen activity.(Citation: Microsoft Quick Assist 2024)(Citation: Microsoft Storm-1811 2024)
